title: LISTEN: The Debate podcast - Liam Rosenior and Craig Bellamy
description: Listen back to the latest edition of The Debate, as Liam Rosenior and Craig Bellamy joined Scott Minto to discuss the big football talking points.
content: The trio looked at what Premier League clubs need to do in the January transfer window, and considered whether Liverpool should replace Philippe Coutinho before the summer.Also up for discussion was Alexis Sanchez's Arsenal future - will the club look to sell this month? Or will he leave on a free once the Premier League season is done and dusted?All that and more in the latest The Debate podcast.Listen to The Debate and subscribe to more podcasts via iTunes
